jamExperience.title: What a Jam feels like
jamExperience.p1:
You arrive with a drink — not a pitch.
Conversations start loosely, then sharpen.
jamExperience.p2:
Someone shares a real decision, doubt, or problem they’re sitting with.
The room listens carefully, then thinks together.
jamExperience.p3:
You leave without a playbook —
but with better questions and clearer instincts.

why.title: Why Montreal Idea Jams exist
why.thesis:
Most entrepreneurial spaces optimize for visibility.
We optimize for thinking.
why.p1: Entrepreneurship is usually discussed in rooms built for pitching, networking, or personal branding.
why.p2: We created MIJ to make space for unfinished thoughts, real trade-offs, and conversations that don’t fit on slides.
why.p3: This is a room for people who care more about clarity than applause — and progress more than polish.
